description: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell: Convictionis the fifth installment in the wildly popularSplinter Cellseries. A stealth-action combat game centered around the continuing adventures of black ops agent Sam Fisher,Splinter Cell: Convictioncontinues where the storyline of the earlierSplinter Cell: Double Agentleft off.
